overview: In the final episode of this intense girl/girl trilogy, the cops are closing in on the Predator. Sheâ€™s on the run, but her carnal desires and lust for beautiful women must be quenched. At a creepy desert motel, the Predator unleashes her sexual deviances on unsuspecting guests. Can the police stop the Predator once and for all?
tagline: She's Back to Finish You Off!
title: Predator III: The Final Chapter
